Statement.description: The procedure uninstall LiveConnect. Version: 0.2 Author: Proserv Team - VS
Statement.name: ExecuteShellCommand

Parameter.name: Command
Parameter.value: Powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "Start-Process -FilePath $(Get-ChildItem -Path """$env:ProgramData\Package Cache""" -Filter bundle.exe -Recurse | ForEach-Object {$_.FullName} | Select-Object -First 1) -ArgumentList """/uninstall /quiet""" -Wait"
